liability_cap: Total cumulative liability will not exceed the aggregate amount of fees and expenses owed by PC Financial to Mobimagic for services performed under this Agreement.
risk_explanation: The agreement includes a broad limitation of liability capped at the aggregate fees/expenses owed, and excludes consequential damages, which can be unfavorable depending on the vendorâ€™s exposure. Termination is only for material breach with a 30-day cure period and there is no clear termination-for-convenience right. There are also cross-border service elements and data-processing obligations, but the contract states the provider will not store/retain PC Financial data (except limited billing records), which reduces some data-handling risk.
